name: Go deep (MoloPopiz)
description:
A bad Wolfenstein 3D clone.

Made on raycasting game maker : https://www.moddb.com/engines/raycasting-game-maker/

Sounds caught on : https://opengameart.org/
Sounds from : Sindwiller, Vinrax, Pauliuw, Spookymodem, Rubberduck andZane little.

2 versions :
A mouse keyboard version.
A keyboard only version (because the mouse does not work correctly on some systems)
